name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Frontend Engineer with 8 years of experience in full-stack development specializing in **Angular**, **React**, **JavaScript**, and **TypeScript**. Proficient in cloud services including **AWS** and container orchestration using **Kubernetes**. Experienced in Agile methodologies and DevOps practices, leveraging CI/CD pipelines such as **GitLab CI** for seamless software delivery. Strong focus on developing microservices and event-driven architectures, ensuring robust and scalable solutions.

I have a proven track record in building compliant applications adhering to standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. Additionally, I possess solid communication and collaboration skills, enabling me to work effectively within cross-functional teams. My background in building enterprise-grade solutions and integrating advanced technologies ensures that I can deliver high-performance applications that meet business objectives.
